1.00.name: wordpress/rainbow
1.00.description: A very beautiful cloudy blue sky, rainbow, colorful balloons and great looking WordPress theme. An elegant, modern and professional theme built with simplicity in mind. Supporting the widgetized sidebar, widget-ready footer area, threaded-comments and multilevel jQuery drop-down custom menu.
